climbs.name: Dr. Dyno (originally submitted as Cigarette Problem)

content.description: This super sweet line starts sitting with good, right-facing crimps. Move to the big pocket then straight to the lip via 2 hidden crimps in the face. The topout is pretty easy. I really like this problem because of the great rock it has, no pebbles.
content.location: This climbs the tall side of the boulder.

climbs.name: Best V4 in the Entire World!?

content.description:
Per Ben Griffin's comment on

50 Foot Smoking Ban

: "around the corner from this problem [50 Foot Smoking Ban] is an overhanging boulder problem that leads to a slab. This might be the best V4 in the entire world, THE ENTIRE WORLD!!!!"

I'm not convinced this is the best V4 in the entire world, but it's pretty damn fun. Get on it, and make the call for yourself.

If anyone knows the FA or original name of this route, please put it in the comments, and I'll edit the page. Until then, this seemed like a good name.
content.location:
It is around the corner from

50 Foot Smoking Ban

.

content.description:
This problem starts the same as

The Cigarette Problem

but heads left at the big pocket. After matching the crimp rail, grab the best looking right hand, then grab the crazy, "pencil eraser" hold with left and huck to the lip.
content.location:
This starts the same as

Dr. Dyno (originally submitted as Cigarette Problem)

problem but finishes left.
